args.natural_language_statement: Prove the polarization identity 4 z\bar{w} = |z+w|^2 - |z-w|^2 + i ( |z+iw|^2 - |z-iw|^2 ), where z and w are complex numbers.

result:
{"ok": true, "lean_translation": "import Mathlib
open ComplexConjugate

/-- Prove the polarization identity 4 z\bar{w} = |z+w|^2 - |z-w|^2 + i ( |z+iw|^2 - |z-iw|^2 ), where z and w are complex numbers. -/
theorem four_mul_im (z w : ℂ) : 4 * z.im * w.im = Complex.normSq (z + w) ^ 2 - Complex.normSq (z - w) ^ 2 +
    Complex.normSq (z + Complex.I • w) ^ 2 - Complex.normSq (z - Complex.I • w) ^ 2 := sorry"}

args.content:
import Mathlib

/-- Polarization identity: 4 z * conj w = |z+w|^2 - |z-w|^2 + i (|z + i w|^2 - |z - i w|^2). -/
theorem polarization_identity (z w : ℂ) :
  4 * z * Complex.conj w =
    Complex.ofReal (Complex.normSq (z + w) - Complex.normSq (z - w))
    + Complex.I * Complex.ofReal (Complex.normSq (z + Complex.I * w) - Complex.normSq (z - Complex.I * w)) := by sorry
